text: 3:14 Matyu 7:19; Efesus 4:28; Filipai 1:11; Kolosi 1:10; Taitus 2:14Kɨ kamaghɨn ifonge, en gumazamiziba, me biziba bar puvatɨzir gumazamizibar akurvagh, egh pura uan ikɨrɨmɨrim ko dughiaba makunan markɨ. Eghtɨ me gumazamizir igharazibar akurvaghamin arazimɨn fofozim inighɨva an suiragh gavgafigh.
